txt.en:
'If you ever want to take up a trade yourself, then you'll need some guidance on the matters. I'd offer my services but Archet needs my skills more now friend; I hope you understand. I can point you toward one who can give you the assistance that you seek, however.

'You'll want to head south out of Archet and towards the centre of Combe. When the road splits in Combe centre follow the road to the left and make your way part way up the hill. You'll see a master of crafts there who is always willing, ready, and able to take on apprentices.

'Be safe friend and once again, thank you for all you've done for Archet. You're the reason that we've a town to still work on repairing after all.'

'Greetings, traveller. If you are looking to take on a profession, I am willing to train you. I have spent my life learning the fundamentals of all crafts. You will never see me hoist a weapon, save to assess its quality.'
Builder Earur provided directions to one who can assist you, should you desire to take on a profession.
Speak with the Master of Apprentices

You should find a Master of Apprentices willing to take on pupils in Combe.\n\nBuilder Earur directed you to a crafting master in Combe. He mentioned that the master can be found by following the left path once you enter Combe centre.
